testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "test@example.com" field...............................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "invalid" "tesst@example.com" and "P@sssw0rd"..........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_ResetPass | user could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.name: user could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user will go to login page............................................passed When user enter valid email and invalid password............................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed And User clicks on forgot password button...................................passed And enter his email address.................................................passed And enter recover button....................................................passed Then success message is shown...............................................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | users will be able to search for products with different parameters
testcase.name: user could search using product name
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to homepage.............................................passed When user click on search bar...............................................passed And user search for product like "Apple iCam"...............................passed And user click on search Button.............................................passed Then user could search and go to search page successfully...................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | users will be able to search for products with different parameters
testcase.name: user search using SKU
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to homepage.............................................passed When user click on search bar...............................................passed And user search for product like "AP_MBP_13"................................passed And user click on search Button.............................................passed Then user could search with SKU successfully................................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | users will be able to search for products with different parameters
testcase.name: user search using invalid product name
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to homepage.............................................passed When user click on search bar...............................................passed And user search for product like "anyThing".................................passed And user click on search Button.............................................passed Then user could not search..................................................passed

testcase.classname: F05_Currency | user could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.name: Logged User could switch between currencies
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to homepage.............................................passed When user change current currency to Euro...................................passed Then user should found all products prices in Euro..........................passed When user change current currency to Dollar.................................passed Then user should found all products prices in Dollar........................passed

testcase.classname: F06_SelectRandomCategory | user could select different Categories and select sub category
testcase.name: Select random category then hover and open sub-Category if found
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to homepage.............................................passed When user hover random category and select subcategory......................passed And user click on subcategory if found......................................passed Then user go to relative product page.......................................passed

testcase.classname: F07_FilterByColor | user could filter by color
testcase.name: Logged user could filter with color
testcase.system-out: Given user will go to login page............................................passed When user enter valid email and valid password..............................passed And user click to login button..............................................passed And user select apparel category............................................passed And user click on shoes.....................................................passed And User select red color...................................................passed Then red one should be displayed............................................passed

testcase.classname: F08_ShoppingCart | Logged user could add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.name: User add different products to Shopping cart successfully
testcase.system-out: When user add product to shopping cart from main page.......................passed And user enter mandatory data about the product.............................passed And user add product to shopping cart from product page.....................passed Then shopping cart notification success is visible..........................passed

testcase.classname: F09_WishList | guest user could add products to wishlist
testcase.name: success message is visible after adding item to wishlist
testcase.system-out: When user go to login page..................................................passed And user login with valid "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".................passed Then user press on login button.............................................passed And user login to the system successfully...................................passed When user add product to wishlist...........................................passed Then wishlist notification success is visible...............................passed

testcase.classname: F09_WishList | guest user could add products to wishlist
testcase.name: number of wishlist items in home page is increased
testcase.system-out: When user go to login page..................................................passed And user login with valid "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".................passed Then user press on login button.............................................passed And user login to the system successfully...................................passed When user add product to wishlist...........................................passed Then wishlist notification success is visible...............................passed And user get the number of wishlist items after adding item.................passed Then the number of wishlist increased.......................................passed

testcase.classname: F10_CompareList | guest user could add products to compareList
testcase.name: product added to compareList successfully
testcase.system-out: When user add product to compareList........................................passed Then compareList notification success.......................................passed

testcase.classname: F12_FollowUs | users could open followUs links
testcase.name: user opens facebook link
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to homepage.............................................passed When user opens facebook link...............................................passed Then "https://www.facebook.com/nopCommerce" is opened in new tab............passed

testcase.classname: F12_FollowUs | users could open followUs links
testcase.name: user opens twitter link
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to homepage.............................................passed When user opens twitter link................................................passed Then "https://twitter.com/nopCommerce" is opened in new tab.................passed

testcase.classname: F12_FollowUs | users could open followUs links
testcase.name: user opens rss link

failure.message: Index 1 out of bounds for length 1

testcase.failure:
